title: Topic 001 Question 296
body: The security engineer implemented a new vault stock policy for 10TB of data and called initiate-vault-lock 12 hours ago. The audit team identified a typo that is allowing incorrect access to the vault.
What is the MOST cost-effective way to correct this?
options: Call the abort-vault-lock operation, fix the typo, and call the initiate-vault-lock again.
Copy the vault data to Amazon S3, delete the vault, and create a new vault with the data.
Update the policy, keeping the vault lock in place.
Update the policy, and call initiate-vault-lock again to apply the new policy.
